Title: Relates to prohibiting admission of sex offenders to state operated psychiatric centers which share facilities with a children's psychiatric center
Summary: Prohibits admission of sex offenders to state operated psychiatric centers which share facilities with a children's psychiatric center.
LawCode: Add ยง9.65, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to treatment of sex offenders in certain facilities
